name: Rustfield Revival
description:
The town of Rustfield has fallen on hard times. Just 'bout everything that could go wrong, did.

Fire? Yup.
Crime? Yup.
Corruption? You betcha.
Tornado? Two.

It's gotten bad enough that the State has appointed you the new Mayor of Rustfield. You've got $1 Million (and questionably broad authority) to turn this place around. Make the citizens of Rustfield happy, but don't run out of money!
